titleStmt.title: Trve newes from Hull being a perfect relation of a conspiracy there by divers cavaliers coming in disguised habits, and entring themselves as souldiers, who intended to have surprised the tovvne, and to have killed Sir Iohn Hotham : with the manner how their wicked purpose was discovered, and they delivered up to safe custody / by R.C.
titleStmt.author: R. C.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
